title: Nigeria ewubego iwu megide itu mgbere mmadu
sentences: Ndị omebe iwu nke ala Nigeria eweputego akwụkwọ iwu ọhụrụ, nke megidere itụ mgbere mmadụ
Ndị otu Nigerian Federal Executive Council enyego nnakwe ha, sị na onye ọ bụna e jidoro ebe ọ na-ada iwu ọhụrụ a megidere ire ma ọ bụ ịzụ mmadụ n’ụdị ọ bụna, ga-aga mkpọrọ afọ asaa

Ka ndị otu a nwechara nzụkọ ha n’Abuja, n’ụbọchị Nwenezdee, onye minista na-ahụ maka mgbasa ozi, Mazị Labaran Maku, kwuru nke a na bekee:
“the Attorney-General of the Federation and Minister of Justice, Mohammed Bello Adoke, tabled a memorandum before the Council to seek approval for the Trafficking in Persons (Prohibition), Enforcement and Administration Bill, 2012

”
Mazị Maku kwuru n’ala Nigeria nweburu iwu megidere ịtụ mgbere mmadụ, mana iwu a nwere ebe ole n’ole o riri mperi
Ihe a na-ame ugbu a bụ ime ka iwu a kwụdosie ike
Ha anabatago mkpọrọ afọ asaa maka onye ọ bụna dara iwu a
Mazị Maku gbakwụnyere na a ga-enyefe akwụkwọ iwu a n’aka ndị ụlọ omebe iwu na nso a, maka ime ka ọ diwazie ire dịka iwu na-achị ala Nigeria
